languages.text: В тот же год, когда Джай Хейдари перестали видеть на публике, на Даргонусе был возведен великолепный и прекрасно охраняемый особняк, получивший в народе название Башня заката. Никто не знает, кому Вольный Торговец пожаловал{mf||а} сей дворец, однако {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость наносил{mf||а} визиты туда с удивительной частотой.
languages.translation_comment:
Джай Теневой барон или Вассал протектората
Есть тру романс

languages.text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.
languages.original_text: В тот же год, когда Джай Хейдари перестали видеть на публике, на Даргонусе был возведен великолепный и прекрасно охраняемый особняк, получивший в народе название Башня заката. Никто не знает, кому Вольный Торговец пожаловал{mf||а} сей дворец, однако {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость наносил{mf||а} визиты туда с удивительной частотой.

traits.locale_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

languages.text: Im selben Jahr, in dem Jae Heydari aus der Öffentlichkeit verschwand, wurde auf Dargonus ein wundersames, stark befestigtes Anwesen errichtet, das gemeinhin als Turm der Dämmerung bekannt ist. Niemand weiß, wem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} diesen Palast gewährt hatte, aber {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} besuchte das Anwesen erstaunlich oft.
languages.original_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

traits.locale_text: Im selben Jahr, in dem Jae Heydari aus der Öffentlichkeit verschwand, wurde auf Dargonus ein wundersames, stark befestigtes Anwesen errichtet, das gemeinhin als Turm der Dämmerung bekannt ist. Niemand weiß, wem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} diesen Palast gewährt hatte, aber {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} besuchte das Anwesen erstaunlich oft.

languages.text: L'année même où Jae Heydari cessa d'apparaître en public, un manoir somptueux et formidablement fortifié sortit de terre sur Dargonus. On l'appelait la Tour du Crépuscule. L'identité de la personne à laquelle {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} offrit ce palais demeura un mystère. En revanche, Sa Seigneurie prit l'habitude de visiter l'endroit de façon étonnamment régulière.
languages.original_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

traits.locale_text: L'année même où Jae Heydari cessa d'apparaître en public, un manoir somptueux et formidablement fortifié sortit de terre sur Dargonus. On l'appelait la Tour du Crépuscule. L'identité de la personne à laquelle {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} offrit ce palais demeura un mystère. En revanche, Sa Seigneurie prit l'habitude de visiter l'endroit de façon étonnamment régulière.

languages.text: El mismo año que Jae Heydari dejó de aparecer en público, se construyó una magnífica mansión fortificada, llamada comúnmente la Torre del Ocaso. Nadie sabe a quién le fue otorgado el palacio por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, pero sus visitas al mismo se convirtieron en algo frecuente.
languages.original_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

traits.locale_text: El mismo año que Jae Heydari dejó de aparecer en público, se construyó una magnífica mansión fortificada, llamada comúnmente la Torre del Ocaso. Nadie sabe a quién le fue otorgado el palacio por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, pero sus visitas al mismo se convirtieron en algo frecuente.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリが公の場に姿を見せなくなったのと同年、夕日の塔として親しまれている、壮麗かつ厳重に要塞化された邸宅がダルゴナスに建てられた。自由開拓者が誰にこの宮殿を与えたのかは知られていないが、陛下は驚くほど頻繁にこの屋敷を訪れていた。
languages.original_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリが公の場に姿を見せなくなったのと同年、夕日の塔として親しまれている、壮麗かつ厳重に要塞化された邸宅がダルゴナスに建てられた。自由開拓者が誰にこの宮殿を与えたのかは知られていないが、陛下は驚くほど頻繁にこの屋敷を訪れていた。

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利不再公开抛头露面。同年，一座金碧辉煌、戒备森严的宅邸在达戈努斯落成，人们称之为“落日之塔”。虽然没人知道行商浪人将这座宅邸赏赐给了谁，但{mf|他|她}拜访这座宅邸的频率高得出奇。
languages.original_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利不再公开抛头露面。同年，一座金碧辉煌、戒备森严的宅邸在达戈努斯落成，人们称之为“落日之塔”。虽然没人知道行商浪人将这座宅邸赏赐给了谁，但{mf|他|她}拜访这座宅邸的频率高得出奇。

languages.text: Jae Heydari'nin halk önüne çıkmayı bıraktığı yıl Dargonus'ta, Gurup Kulesi olarak bilinen, tahkim edilmiş bir malikâne inşa edildi. Hür Tacir'in bu sarayı kime tahsis ettiğini kimse bilmiyor ancak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, malikâneyi şaşırtıcı derecede sık ziyaret ediyordu.
languages.original_text: In the same year that Jae Heydari ceased appearing in public, a magnificent and heavily fortified mansion, popularly known as the Tower of Sunset, was built on Dargonus. No one knows to whom the Rogue Trader granted this palace, but {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} visited the mansion with surprising frequency.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari'nin insanların gözü önüne çıkmayı bıraktığı yıl, Dargonus'ta, Gurup Kulesi olarak bilinen, tahkim edilmiş bir konak inşa edildi. Hür Tacir'in bu sarayı kime tahsis ettiğini kimse bilmiyor ancak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, konağı şaşırtıcı derecede sık ziyaret etti.

languages.translation_comment:
Джай Теневой барон или Вассал протектората
Есть тру романс
